Audio.Locality: El canon del Rio Claro, Antioquia
Audio.Author: Herman van Oosten
Audio.Comments: Wonderful birds, no playback. We saw three (out of five in the tree!) on one branch of which two singing males. Head down and tail up, if I remember correctly. As always with barbets, they're way closer than you'd expect! The ssp. name was chosen a bit hastely, fortunately!
